meanings.definition: The quality of being importunate or persistent in solicitation or entreaty.
meanings.sent1: Her importunatenesses in asking for a raise made her boss uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: The importunatenesses of the salesperson annoyed the customers.
meanings.sent3: His importunatenesses in requesting extra vacation days became a running joke in the office.
meanings.sent4: The importunatenesses of the persistent door-to-door salesman were hard to ignore.
meanings.sent5: The importunatenesses of the dripping faucet echoed through the silent house.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being importunate or troublesome in solicitation or entreaty.
meanings.sent1: Dealing with the importunatenesses of telemarketers can be frustrating.
meanings.sent2: The importunatenesses of the charity organization's calls became overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The importunatenesses of the persistent cat meowing for food was both annoying and endearing.
meanings.sent4: The importunatenesses of the storm's howling wind kept everyone awake.
meanings.sent5: The importunatenesses of the alarm clock's ringing shattered the morning peace.
